text:
He sells an expensive course, if I recall it's 3K pounds or something like that, he shares the screen with students during a few working days.

As far as I know he works in favor of goals at low odds and exploits price variations in favor of time.

It watches games with its own antennas and only works at events where there are no people with a delay advantage.

Lots of experience and knowledge to predict future events in a live football game.

text:
Yes he used to use fast pictures and capitalise on the time decay for scalping. Im not sure there is much advantage these days to fast(er) pictures with the delays betfair add.
Seems like a decent guy (I recall him giving away a month of his profits to Charity)
Good luck to him

text: This has been going on for some time, not the first or tenth time. In the beginning Betfair only left the 1x2 market open but yesterday it was all markets. What happens is that they close the market on the penalty kick but before the charge they open, just like the soft bookies, bet365 and Betano do.
